Gary.WIND (AM): WIND "AM 560" is a radio station based in Chicago, Illinois, broadcasting its talk radio format on 560 kHz. Its 5,000 Watt signal is heard throughout the Chicago metropolitan area, as well as parts of Southeast Wisconsin and Northwest Indiana, and transmits from a location in Griffith, IN., with studios located in Elk Grove Village. The WIND antenna is a four-tower array.
